titles.title: Tesagure! Bukatsumono Spin-off Purupurun Sharumu to Asobou
てさぐれ! 部活もの すぴんおふ プルプルんシャルムと遊ぼう
Tesagure! 3
摸索吧！部活剧 第三期

anime.description: Koharu is recruited into an unusual "groping" club only for the reason that she doesn`t overlap with the other members` characters. Groping club is in fact an unofficial club with no real activity or purpose, prompting the girls to work on finding one. Strange daily life ensues, where club activities consist of first coming up with club stereotypes, then figuring out a new way to operate such a club. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: medium awareness
tag.description: Medium awareness is the situational and generally temporary awareness characters in works of fiction have and display of the very fact that they are characters in works of fiction. For example, they may comment about the background music, quip about the script or narration, complain about the roles given to them by the writer or their lack of screen time, see the subtitles that appear on screen, inform the audience about the arrival of the commercial break, and even use medium effects as tools. The most common form of medium awareness is known as breaking the fourth wall, in which characters speak directly to the audience, either to it as a whole or to specific members of it. The "fourth wall" is the imaginary "wall" at the front of the stage of a proscenium theatre through which the audience sees the play; it is a metaphor for the boundary between what happens inside the work, to the characters, and outside it, to the audience.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

episode.title: 別荘と校歌で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Country Villas and School Songs
Bessou to Kouka de Asobou
episode.summary: Yua joins the younger members as they imagine what a "new country villa" would be like. Later, the older members put their heads together to come up with a new school song for their high school. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 面接と卓球部で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Interviews and the Table Tennis Club
Mensetsu to Takkyuu Bu de Asobou
episode.summary: The apprentice goddesses explore their strong points and brainstorm ways to improve job interviews. Meanwhile, the older girls borrow a ping pong table and think of a "new table tennis club". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 体操部とミュージカルで遊ぼう
Let`s Play with the Gymnastics Club and Musicals
Taisou Bu to Musical de Asobou
episode.summary: The new club members riff on what a "new gymnastics club" might be like and then the original members re-introduce the Tesaguri Club by launching into highlight clips, but done with musical numbers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女性型戦闘ロボとひとコマ漫画で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Female-Type Battle Robots and One-Frame Manga
Amusons-nous avec les femmes-robots et les mangas en une case !
Josei-gata Sentou Robo to Hito Koma Manga de Asobou
episode.summary: The club returns with new members! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
Opening
人狼と百合で遊ぼう➁
Let`s Play with Werewolves and Yuri 2
Jinrou to Yuri de Asobou 2
episode.summary: The fun continues with almost all of the members playing a game of "Yuriwolf". The focus narrows down to two members suspected of being a Yuriwolf, even as the number of man-loving members decreases. Is one of the two suspects lying? Or maybe...? The bond between members is deepend through this collaboration, but can they safely root out the Yuriwolf and bring peace back to the dorm? Don`t miss the shocking conclusion! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人狼と百合で遊ぼう①
Let`s Play with Werewolves and Yuri 1
Jinrou to Yuri de Asobou 1
episode.summary: Almost all of the members are gathered together this time. They decide to play the party game "Werewolf", but to put an original spin on it, they incorporate a "yuri" element. Among the go-home club, fortune-telling club, and kendo club are two Yuriwolves who come night after night to the Tosei High School girls` dorm. In order to keep the dorm safe, the members talk to each and try to ferret out the Yuriwolves, but in the end... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 歯医者と観覧車で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Dentists and Ferris Wheels
Haisha to Kanransha de Asobou
episode.summary: The shuffling of members according to when they can record continues! Aoi and Rin duel over a "new dentist". Then the original members continue their "location recording" from last week and go on a Ferris wheel, which terrifies Hiina! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遠足とお化け屋敷で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Field Trips and Haunted Houses
Ensoku to Obakeyashiki de Asobou
episode.summary: The shuffling of character rosters ramps up! And suddenly, Mio-senpai, the former captain of the Tesaguri Club, appears! Even with her peculiar pace and mysterious tone that throws the proceedings into confusion, the shuffled members think of "new field trips". The second half features an unheard-of "location recording" at an amusement park. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MAJIてさぐりグランプリで遊ぼう
Let`s Play with a Totally Tesaguri Grand Prix
Maji Tesaguri Grand Prix de Asobou
episode.summary: For the season (and maybe series) finale, the first Totally Tesagure Grand Prix is held, a competition to find and reward the funniest member. Except one key cast member is missing, Yua is punchy from lack of sleep, and Aoi is more sharp-tongued than ever! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 今までの映像で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with All the Footage up to Now
Ima made no Eizou de Asobou
episode.summary: Big problems for the penultimate episode as none of the cast schedules match up. That and exhausted animators make for a crisis that the Tesaguri members solve by recycling footage from the first 10 episodes and then re-dubbing them in various ways! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美容院と川柳で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Beauty Salons and Comic Haiku
Biyouin to Senryuu de Asobou
episode.summary: After Kanon gets a bad haircut, a mix of the old and new Tesaguri members launch into a discussion of beauty salons and how to make them "new". Later, the original members continue their tour of the zoo, stopping to handle baby chicks and meet a pony. Back at the club, they continue the zoo theme by creating comical haiku with animals as the subject. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画館と動物園で遊ぼう
Let`s Play with Movie Theaters and Zoos
Eigakan to Doubutsuen de Asobou
episode.summary: The mix-and-matched members talk about movie theaters, but when Kanon oddly boasts that she`s never been to one, they all decide to go together, a dangerous prospect considering this group. But afterwards they discuss how movie theaters could be improved, such as having wet seats. Later, the original Tesaguri members are live at the zoo, where they`re lucky enough to watch and be watched by procreating animals! Source: crunchyroll
